name: Wizards And Warlocks
description:
In a world where those with magical abilities are hunted down and killed, a rightful ruler, Vin, struggles to take her place on the throne. Fight your way through the palace dungeon using sorceries. Take your rightful place back from the corrupt king!

Credits
  • Eric (Project Manager & Developer)
  • Dev (Developer)
  • Thaneesha (Developer)
Assets
  • Top-Down Game 2D Character by gummypopcat
  • Tiny Dungeon by Kenney Game Assets
  • Pixel Art UI by BDragon1727
